attributes.action: Provide free sanitary items for all females in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Many people in the United Kingdom are unfortunately currently living in poverty, especially due to the COVID-19 pandemic, as people are losing their jobs or are on limited hours. If the government were to provide sanitary items for everyone in the UK, it would help out so many families and individuals who are struggling financially.
attributes.background: Sanitary items for menstruation should be free for all women, trans-men, and non-binary people in the UK. People who regularly get periods spend approximately £50 per annum, which could fund other daily necessities such as food, electricity, transport, and rent.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
